alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:14AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iron and southwestern Ashland Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 814 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mellen, or 24 miles northwest of Park Falls, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hurley, Mellen, Saxon, Gurney, Upson, Glidden, Montreal, Kimball, Morse, Pence, Bad River Reservation, Cedar, Franks Field, High Bridge, Iron Belt, Birch Hill, Copper Falls State Park, and New Odanah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
